dc:title: PublishingLab Manual 2016/2017
dc:creator: PublishingLab Team
dc:subject: publishing, experimental, digital, books, apps, reading, manual, epub, design process, multidisciplinary teams, code, design, tools, interaction, archive, documentation, research
dc:description: The PublishingLab is an applied research lab in the field of hybrid publishing working at the intersection of publishing and digital technology, both in print and on a screen. This manual is meant for students and professionals alike to get involved in our activities.
